body.name: Jorkar 256GB SSD for MacBook Pro A1708 NVMe PCIe Gen3x4 M.2, Internal Solid State Drive Upgrade for MacBook Pro A1708 (2016-2017)

features: [SSD for MacBook Upgrade]: Replace the SSD to increase the capacity and processing speed up to 2150MB/s. Perfectly compatible with MacBook Pro A1708, 2016 EMC 2978, 2017 EMC 3164. Note,Just Non-Touch Bar Models Supported. Model & EMC needs both match, or it will not work.

[IMPORTANT NOTE] Before removal, Back up your original data to USB drive; and Updated your old original SSD to mac OS 10.13 High Sierra or Later version. If not, the new SSD will not be recognized after replacement.

[Pre-installed MacOS Catalina] For a better experience, we pre-installed macOS system for customers. Because many customers Do not how to install the systems after receiving the SSD. For better compatibility, we pre-installed 10.15 Catalina system. If you want a higher system, you can go to the Apple Store to upgrade it.

[High Speed & Safety] With Jorkar PCIe NVMe SSD, greatly upgrade for your Macbook 2016-2017, read speed is up to 2150 MB/s, write speed 1650 MB/s (1TB). Faster boot times, faster application loading times and better system responsiveness. With the Encryption program, protect your data safely.

[5 Years Warranty] We provide 5 Years warranty and lifetime tech support, if there are any problems with the SSD drive for Macbook, please contact us freely and we will give you a satisfied solution. Jorkar SSD for Macbook is Safer & Faster for your macbook upgrade!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you annoyed that your macbook is too slow and has too little memory? Now upgrade it by Jorkar SSD, to have a nice experience! If you have an old Macbook pro A1708(2016-2017), and annoying with the original drive's slow speed & little memory, you should get a Jorkar SSD for macbook to upgrade it now! 256GB 512GB 1TB for your choice! Read speed is up to 2150MB/s and the sequential write speed is up to 1650MB/s. Faster and more reliable! IMPORTANT NOTICE: Before moving out original SSD, must upgrade the host MAC to macOS 10.13 High Sierra (or 10.14 Mojave or 10.15 Catalina).

Pre-installed MacOS for you, Simple Operation! For a better experience, we pre-installed macOS system for customers. Because many customers Do not know how to install the systems after receiving the SSD. For better compatibility, we pre-installed 10.15 Catalina system. If you want a higher system, you can go to the Apple Store to upgrade it. But important again, before removal, Back up your original data to USB drive; and Updated your old original SSD to mac OS 10.13 High Sierra or Later version. If not, the new SSD will not be recognized after replacement. Note, when you update the MacOS, please change to the regional language, then the installation will begin.
Compatible with Macbook Pro A1708 (2016-2017), Just support Non-touch Bar, EMC 2978 in 2016 & EMC 3164 in 2017.

Original Interface, PCIe NVMe SSD for Macbook, Fast Speed and Stable! Jorkar SSD for macbook adopts M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen 3.0 technology, The sequential read speed is up to 2150MB/s and the sequential write speed is up to 1650MB/s, which is 5 times the speed of SATA SSD. It can quickly transfer various large files, images and videos, you can do data-intensive work without worrying that your computer will stall or freeze. Note: Transfer speed varies by drive capacity, system, tested hardware, and application.

Security Guard for your Data in Macbook! Support TRIM / S.M.A.R.T / Garbage Collection / LDPC ECC etc, let the nvme ssd has more stable and reliable performance. Run cooler and less power consumed, extend your Mac life. Less prone to damage due to shock and vibration without moving parts. Adopt non volatile storage technology that doesn’t require power to retain data. Don’t make any noise at all.

Jorkar SSD for Macbook Specifications: Form Factor: M.2 Interface: PCIe NVMe Gen3*4 Control chip: Silicon Motion Flash Type: 3D TLC NAND Flash Product Size: 89.2*24*2mm Sequential Read Speed: 2200MB/s (1TB), 2000MB/s (512GB), 1800MB/s (256GB). Sequential Write Speed: 1650MB/s (1TB), 1550MB/s (512GB), 1450MB/s (256GB). (The read/write speed is related to the performance of the device and may be lower than the above values.) Data retention: >20years @ 25°C Storage temperature: -45~85 °C Operation temperature: -0~70°C Power Supply: 3.3V±5% Support OS version: macOS 10.13+ or later Item packaging includes: 1*SSD, 2*screwdrivers for MacBook back case & SSD.
Just Enjoy the work or entertainment in your "new" Macbook!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The instillation guide was step by step and they even walk you through getting your Mac back up and running again, they also pre-installed macOS system for us! They also sent tools that worked great. The memory upgrade process was easy and it works! The quality of this ssd was sperfect. It was everything I wanted it to be a small upgrade in space sure but nothing beats a fresh start on a crisp, and fast ssd. I'm glad I chose this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice upgrade for an older workhorse
reviews.reviewText: I selected this drive for my MacBook Pro with a 128GB drive which was getting rather full. I was able to back everything up to an external drive and then following the instructions included with the drive, I was able to get the old drive removed and this one added in. Setting up the new drive with the latest OS image took a little bit of time but once completed I had a clean system with lots of extra storage space. I have not noticed any slowdown in speed with the new drive, perhaps it even seems faster but that may be down to the fresh installation. This is an inexpensive upgrade to an older system which I still find to be very useful on a nearly daily basis.

reviews.reviewTitle: Man sollte sich nicht beirren lassen von der Produktbeschreibung und lieber etwas teureres kaufen!
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe die Jorkar 256GB SSD für mein MacBook erworben, basierend auf der vielversprechenden Produktbeschreibung des Herstellers.Leider konnte das Produkt meine Erwartungen nicht erfüllen, und ich vergebe daher nur 1 Stern.Pro:Das Produkt wird mit den erforderlichen Schraubendrehern für die Installation geliefert.Die NVMe PCIe Gen 3.0-Technologie ermöglicht theoretisch hohe Übertragungsraten.Contra:Die tatsächliche Leistung der SSD liegt weit unter den vom Hersteller angegebenen Werten. Mit einer Schreibgeschwindigkeit von 883,4 MB/s und einer Lesegeschwindigkeit von 1181,0 MB/s verfehlt sie deutlich die versprochenen 1650 MB/s beim Schreiben und 2150 MB/s beim Lesen.Die Produktbeschreibung weckt falsche Erwartungen, und die beworbenen sequenziellen Geschwindigkeiten wurden in meinen Tests nicht annähernd erreicht.Die Qualität des mitgelieferten Schraubendrehers könnte besser sein.Fazit:Es ist wichtig zu betonen, dass die tatsächliche Leistung dieser SSD weit hinter den beworbenen Werten zurückbleibt. Daher würde ich zukünftigen Käufern empfehlen, sich nicht von der Produktbeschreibung täuschen zu lassen und stattdessen in Erwägung zu ziehen, etwas mehr für eine zuverlässigere Alternative auszugeben. Leider entspricht dieses Produkt nicht meinen Erwartungen an eine leistungsstarke SSD für mein MacBook.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cambio SSD nel mio MACBOOK. Favoloso
reviews.reviewText: Ho comprato questo SSD per sostituirlo a quello, oramai, vecchissimo del mio macbook pro.Inutile dire quanto è migliorato in prestazioni (velocità) il mac.Le caratteristiche parlano di un aumento della velocità dei dati e si nota a primo impatto!Sistema operativo già integrato all'interno quindi non c'è bisogno di installarlo manualmente.Io ho acquistato la versione da 1TB e non l'ho neanche lontanamente caricato del tutto, pertanto, dopo 1 mese abbondante dal ricevimento, posso consigliare l'acquisto in base a questi dati.Prezzo onesto, pagato circa 150 euro.

reviews.reviewTitle: Se non era per questo SSD non lo avrei utilizzato più il mio vecchio Mac.
reviews.reviewText: Questo SSD da 1TB per MacBook Pro è proprio una bella scoperta! Ho deciso di sostituire il mio vecchio SSD e questo sembra davvero promettente.Con 1000 GB di spazio e una specie di connessione magica chiamata PCIE x 4, è come dargli superpoteri.Nella caratteristiche c’è scritto che questo SSD migliora la velocità fino a 2150 MB/s, e io dico WOW!È compatibile con il mio MacBook Pro A1708 del 2016, quindi va bene anche per i non esperti come me. Hanno persino messo dentro MacOS Catalina, il che è fantastico perché odio installare cose.L’ho fatto installare da uno esperto e mi ha detto che gli sembra una buona scelta per chi, come me, non sa molto ma vuole rendere il suo MacBook più veloce e figo.

Ho comprato questo ssd da 1 tb per il mio mac e ne sono molto soddisfatto. È veloce, silenzioso, facile da installare e ha una grande capacità. Lo consiglio a chi cerca un'ottima soluzione di archiviazione. Venditore serio e spedizione veloce.

Ottimo per upgrade di sistema per aumentare a dismisura lo spazio disponibile su Mac, buona velocità di trasferimento dati. Prezzo in linea con il mercato, insomma un buon compromesso tra prestazioni e prezzo. Indispensabile al giorno d'oggi se si vuole mantenere un sistema datato e renderlo di nuovo competitivo.
